text: VKCDB (Voltage-gated potassium Channel DataBase) is a database of functional data about the voltage-gated potassium channels. ==See also== * Voltage-gated potassium channel ==References== ==External links== * http://vkcdb.biology.ualberta.ca Category:Biological databases Category:Ion channels Category:Electrophysiology
title: Voltage-gated potassium channel database
